item.description:
Contemplative Movement includes sitting meditation combined with other types of movement improvisation to open body-mind awareness, and fully experience this present moment. Self, others, and space shape the “dance” of each session. No dance or meditation experience necessary--- all are welcome!

Designed for everyone who is open to the journey through the body, this workshop offers a unique and soulful approach to deepening individual practice of body awareness.

Contemplative Movement works with the innate intelligence of the body, psyche and imagination, and their drive for wholeness and integration. We pay attention to the body and invite it to lead into movement or stillness, suspending self-criticism and cultivating awareness.

This workshop gently guides people with or without previous experience into this accessible yet powerful form of moving meditation.

The cost is $8 per person. Green Vibration members may count this as one of four free classes per month according to their membership benefits.

To learn more about becoming a member, please visit: www.GrowingGreenEvents.com/Join-our-Community
item.name: Contemplative Movement
